sentences.sContent: BrightFarms, for example, together with a firm called Better Food Solutions, began constructing a large single-storey glasshouse on the roof of a big supermarket in October.
sentences.sContent_eng: BrightFarms, for example, together with a firm called Better Food Solutions, began constructing a large single-storey glasshouse on the roof of a big supermarket in October.
sentences.sCn: 比如，光明农场系统公司现在正在和一家名为“好上好食品”（BetterFood Solutions）的公司合作，自10月份开始在一家大超市的屋顶上建造一座单层的大温室。

sentences.sContent: The method is used commercially, especially for glasshouse crops, and also in experimental work in determining the effects of mineral deficiencies.
sentences.sContent_eng: The method is used commercially, especially for glasshouse crops, and also in experimental work in determining the effects of mineral deficiencies.
sentences.sCn: 此法经常在商业中使用，尤其是针对一些温室作物，或者用于验证矿质元素的缺乏对植物产生的影响的实验。

trans.tranOther: a building made mainly of glass which is used for growing plants
